title: Sonyâ€™s mid-range Xperia 10 II is getting its stable Android 12 update
content:
Towards the end of last month, Sony rolled out stable Android 12 updates for the Xperia 10 III and the Xperia Pro-I. The update brought all the new Android 12 features to the devices, along with the Android security patches for February 2022. Sony is now rolling out a similar update for the older Xperia

The post Sony’s mid-range Xperia 10 II is getting its stable Android 12 update appeared first on XDA.
description: Sony has started rolling out the stable Android 12 update for its mid-range Xperia 10 II. Read on to learn how you can install it manually.
